description: This file declares an interface class 'IEventHandler' within the WPEFramework::Plugin namespace. The interface defines four pure virtual methods handling container events: started, stopped, failed, and state change, each accepting a JsonObject reference as data.

classes.name: IEventHandler
classes.description: Interface class defining event handler methods for container lifecycle events.

methods.name: onContainerStarted
methods.description: Handles event when a container has started; takes a JsonObject reference as parameter.

methods.name: onContainerStopped
methods.description: Handles event when a container has stopped; takes a JsonObject reference as parameter.

methods.name: onContainerFailed
methods.description: Handles event when a container has failed; takes a JsonObject reference as parameter.

methods.name: onContainerStateChange
methods.description: Handles event when a container's state changes; takes a JsonObject reference as parameter.
